    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String password)
        This constructor creates a new user and sets its state to inactive
        Parameters:
        name - The name we want to assign to the user, this will be the username used for logging in
        password - The password required when in future we want to use this user
